lukuvinkit.controllers

Class Controllers

  • java.lang.Object
    • lukuvinkit.controllers.Controllers

  • @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(value="list")
public class Controllers
extends java.lang.Object
    A centralized controller class. Has the Spring @SessionAttributes("list") annotation to preserve list on redirects and page refreshes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controllers()
      The constructor is annotated with @Autowired for spring dependency injections.

      A method that handles saving new tips that have been sent as a POST-request from the view.
      java.lang.String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      This method handles all of the GET-requests in our single-page app.

      A method that handles swapping priorities of two different ReadingTips with a PATCH-request from the view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controllers

        @Autowired
public Controllers()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException

        The constructor is annotated with @Autowired for spring dependency injections.

        The database is initialized in this constructor with Database.initializeDatabaseIfUninitialized().

        A service for handling database actions is created through ReadingTipService.ReadingTipService().

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of database errors.

    • Method Detail

      • home

        @GetMapping(value="*")
public java.lang.String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException

        This method handles all of the GET-requests in our single-page app.

        A list of ReadingTipListingUnit.ReadingTipListingUnit() objects is made and added to the model as an attribute to be shown in the view.

        Attributes for comments, new tips and tags are also added for data handling.

        Parameters:
        model - the models being sent to the view.
        Returns:
        index - the main view.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of database errors.

      • createComment

        @PostMapping(value="/comment")
public java.lang.String createComment(@RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.Integer id,
                                                                      @ModelAttribute
                                                                      Comment comment)
                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException

        A method that handles saving new comments that have been sent as a POST-request from the view.

        The comments are saved with ReadingTipService.saveNewComment(Comment, int).

        Parameters:
        id - takes the id of the associated tip from the view to tie it together with the comment parameter.
        comment - the contents of the comment that's being added.
        Returns:
        redirect:/ - redirects to the main page.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of database errors.

      • createReadingTip

        @PostMapping(value="/readingtip")
public java.lang.String createReadingTip(@ModelAttribute
                                                                            ReadingTip readingTip,
                                                                            org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResultTip,
                                                                            @ModelAttribute
                                                                            Tag tag,
                                                                            org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResultTag)
                                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException

        A method that handles saving new tips that have been sent as a POST-request from the view.

        The comments are saved with ReadingTipService.saveNewReadingTip(ReadingTip, Tag).

        Parameters:
        readingTip - information of the tip being saved down to the database.
        tag - a list of possible tags being added together with the new tip.
        bindingResultTip - holds the result for the validation for tips.
        bindingResultTag - holds the result for the validation of tags.
        Returns:
        redirect:/ - redirects to the main page. In case of validation errors, redirects without saving tip.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of database errors.

      • toggleRead

        @PatchMapping(value="/toggleread")
public java.lang.String toggleRead(@RequestParam
                                                                       java.lang.Integer id)
                                                                throws java.sql.SQLException

        A method that handles setting tips as read and unread with a PATCH-request from the view.

        The toggling is handled by ReadingTipService.toggleReadingTipRead(int)

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the tip being toggled as read/unread.
        Returns:
        redirect:/ - redirects to the main page.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of database errors.

      • swapPriorities

        @PatchMapping(value="/swappriorities")
public java.lang.String swapPriorities(@RequestParam
                                                                               java.lang.Integer id1,
                                                                               @RequestParam
                                                                               java.lang.Integer id2)
                                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException

        A method that handles swapping priorities of two different ReadingTips with a PATCH-request from the view.

        The swapping is handled by ReadingTipService.swapPriorities(int, int)

        Parameters:
        id1 - the id of the first tip being swapped.
        id2 - the id of the other tip being swapped.
        Returns:
        redirect:/ - redirects to the main page.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of database errors.
